### VERSION ###
DKSET(PUGIXML_MAJOR_VERSION 1)
DKSET(PUGIXML_MINOR_VERSION 6)
DKSET(PUGIXML_VERSION pugixml-${PUGIXML_MAJOR_VERSION}.${PUGIXML_MINOR_VERSION})

### INSTALL ###
DKINSTALL2(https://github.com/zeux/pugixml/releases/download/v${PUGIXML_MAJOR_VERSION}.${PUGIXML_MINOR_VERSION}/${PUGIXML_VERSION}.zip pugixml ${PUGIXML_VERSION})
DKSET(PUGIXML ${3RDPARTY}/${PUGIXML_VERSION})
